project_overview.name: Customer Onboarding and Success Portal (COSP)
project_overview.description: A web-based portal that provides a personalized onboarding experience, self-service resources, and usage analytics for customers of the main SaaS product.

feature_breakdown.description: Allow customers to log in to the COSP using their main SaaS product credentials.
acceptance_criteria: Customers can log in to the COSP using their existing credentials
Secure session management and logout functionality

feature_breakdown.description: Display an onboarding checklist tailored to the customer's subscription level.
acceptance_criteria: Onboarding checklists are accurately displayed based on the customer's subscription tier
Customers can track their progress through the onboarding steps

feature_breakdown.description: Integrate with the existing knowledge base API to allow seamless content searching and viewing.
acceptance_criteria: Customers can search and view all relevant product documentation
Search results are accurately filtered and displayed

feature_breakdown.description: Display a dashboard showing the customer's adoption metrics, such as daily active users and feature usage.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboards accurately reflect the customer's usage and adoption metrics
Dashboards are intuitive and easy to navigate

feature_breakdown.description: Provide a 'Contact CSM' button that pre-populates an email or Zendesk ticket with customer details.
acceptance_criteria: Customers can easily initiate a support request with their details pre-populated
Requests are correctly routed to the appropriate CSM or support channel

technical_architecture.data_flow: Customer data is retrieved from the CRM and Subscription Management System, used to personalize the onboarding experience and populate the usage dashboard. Knowledge base content is fetched from the API and displayed within the portal. Support requests are routed to the appropriate CSM or Zendesk ticket.
security_considerations: Implement role-based access control (RBAC) for sensitive customer data
Use industry-standard encryption (TLS 1.2+) for all data in transit
Regularly audit and update security protocols to comply with ISO 27001 standards

implementation_phases.description: Deliver the core functionality of the COSP, including secure login, personalized onboarding checklists, and knowledge base integration.
deliverables: API integrations with identity management, subscription, and knowledge base systems
User acceptance testing and deployment to production

implementation_phases.description: Implement the customer adoption dashboard and CSM integration features to improve customer success and reduce churn.
deliverables: Reporting engine and data visualization components
User acceptance testing and production deployment

implementation_phases.description: Continuously improve the COSP based on customer feedback and evolving business needs.

risk_analysis.description: Delays in third-party API integrations (e.g., Salesforce, Zendesk, Knowledge Base)
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Engage with integration partners early, establish clear communication and escalation channels, and have contingency plans for manual data entry.

risk_analysis.description: Difficulty in creating personalized onboarding experiences based on subscription tiers
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Invest in thorough requirements gathering, design workshops, and iterative development to ensure the solution meets customer needs.

risk_analysis.description: Unexpected performance issues due to high user concurrency or data processing loads
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Implement comprehensive load testing, leverage cloud-native scalability features, and monitor performance metrics closely during production rollout.

tools_and_technologies: AWS (EC2, RDS, API Gateway, Lambda, etc.)
infrastructure_needs: Monitoring and logging tools (CloudWatch, Datadog, etc.)

success_metrics.target_value: Decrease by 5 percentage points within 12 months
success_metrics.measurement_method: Analyze customer retention data from the CRM system

success_metrics.target_value: Reduce from 30 days to 14 days within 6 months
success_metrics.measurement_method: Track the time between customer signup and first feature adoption

success_metrics.target_value: Reduce time spent on manual onboarding tasks by 25%
success_metrics.measurement_method: Monitor CSM time tracking data and survey feedback

success_metrics.target_value: Increase the percentage of support questions resolved via the portal to 40%
success_metrics.measurement_method: Analyze support ticket data and portal usage metrics
